```{r}
library(readr)
library(readxl)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
data <- read_excel("C:/Users/earls/OneDrive/Documents/RProjects/RProjects/MyProjects/Diet and Health/Amino acids/Data/Safe levels of protein intake.xlsx", sheet=2)

data <- data %>%
  slice(-9) %>%
  view()
```

```{r}
View(data)
```


```{r}
data <- data %>% rename(
  "2-5 years" = "children_2_5_years_mg_kg_day",
  "10-12 years" = "children_10_12 years_mg_kg_day",
  "Above 18 years" = "adults_18_years_mg_kg_day",
  "Above 18 (rev)" = "adults_revised_mg_kg_day"
)
```


```{r}
View(data)
```

```{r}
colnames(data)
```



```{r}
data1 <- data %>%
  select(-"Above 18 (rev)") %>%
  pivot_longer(cols = c("2-5 years", "10-12 years", "Above 18 years"), names_to = "age_group", values_to = "mg_kg_day" )
```

```{r}
View(data1)
```

```{r}
colnames(data)
```


```{r}
ggplot(data1, aes(mg_kg_day,amino_acid, fill = age_group))+
geom_bar(stat = "identity", position = "dodge") +  # Horizontal grouped bars
  labs(
    title = "Amino Acid Requirements by Age Group",
    x = "Amount (mg/kg/day)",
    y = "Amino Acid"
  ) +
  scale_fill_brewer(palette = "Set3") +  # Optional color palette
  theme_minimal()
```
